title: AddTagsAction
description: Apply Tags to the selected assets.

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Apply tags to the children of the selected assets that match the criteria. E.g., columns, tasks, topic fields,...

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update tags even if they are already defined in the asset. By default, incoming tags are merged with the existing ones.
